bio: Joseph Samachson died of complications from Parkinson's disease in 1980. He was survived by his wife, now deceased, a son, Michael Samachson, and a daughter, the photographer Miriam Berkley. name: Joseph Samachson
summary: Joseph "Joe" Samachson (October 13, 1906 – June 1980) was an American scientist and author, primarily of science fiction and comic books.
